ImageFunction.flipUD

Function/Meaning
Vertical Flip
Type
Method of the ImageFunction class
Syntax
flipUD(bmp, rect=null)
Arguments
bmp Specifies the Bitmap object to flip.
rect Specifies the area to flip as a Rect object (relative to the Bitmap's image position).
If omitted, the entire area is targeted.
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Performs a vertical flip of the image.
